Private Dedicated RPC Nodes for NEAR Protocol

  • Enhanced Performance: Our dedicated RPC nodes are optimized for high performance, ensuring faster query responses and transaction submissions. This is crucial for applications requiring real-time data access and processing.
  • Increased Reliability: By providing private RPC nodes, we eliminate the common bottlenecks associated with shared nodes. This means your project will experience fewer downtimes and more consistent performance.
  • Scalability: As your project grows, so does the demand for robust and scalable infrastructure. Our dedicated nodes can be scaled seamlessly to meet your increasing needs without compromising on speed or reliability.
  • Security: Security is paramount in blockchain operations. Our private RPC nodes offer enhanced security features to protect your data and transactions, ensuring a secure environment for your project.
  • Customizability: We offer the flexibility to customize the RPC nodes according to your projectâ€™s specific requirements. Whether you need specialized configurations or additional features, we can tailor our service to meet your needs.

Contact us for a dedicated RPC nodes with a custom configuration

Indexed data NEARDATA for NEAR Protocol

It's a simple and free alternative to the publicly available S3-based service NEAR Lake Framework

FASTNEAR provides servers for both mainnet and testnet:

  • Mainnet: https://mainnet.neardata.xyz
  • Testnet: https://testnet.neardata.xyz

The data is free to use and doesn't require any authentication. The bandwidth is limited to 1 Gbps, so you may experience throttling if there are too many parallel requests. We use caching to reduce the load on the server and improve the response time, but it would more likely to be useful for the latest data.

To index historical, you may read data in a sequential manner, starting from the block you need or from the genesis block (9820210 for mainnet) and moving forward up to the final block.

If you want to subscribe to the latest data, start from the latest finalized block and poll the server for the new blocks incrementing the block height by one, making sure you wait for the response.

For more information, visit GitHub

Ultra-Fast API for NEAR Protocol data

Elevate your blockchain applications with our ultra-fast NEAR Protocol API. Designed for developers and enterprises alike, our API provides comprehensive and aggregated data about NEAR accounts, ensuring you have all the information you need at your fingertips.

  • Public Key to Account ID Mapping: Instantly map any public key to its corresponding account ID with unparalleled speed and accuracy.
  • Full Access Public Key to Account ID Mapping: Gain insights into full access public key mappings for enhanced security and control.
  • Delegated Staking Pools: Discover which staking pools accounts are delegated to, helping you track validator interactions and staking activities.
  • Fungible Token Balances: Access detailed information about fungible token balances for any account, enabling you to monitor and manage digital assets effectively.
  • Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs): Retrieve data on NFTs associated with any account, empowering you to explore the vibrant world of digital collectibles.
  • Top Token Holders: Identify the top 100 accounts by balance for any fungible token, providing valuable insights into token distribution and major stakeholders.

For more information, visit GitHub

Custom Indexer Solutions for NEAR Protocol

Relying solely on RPC to query blockchain data can be limiting and inefficient. A custom indexer offers a powerful alternative by creating a dedicated database that meticulously collects, filters, processes, and aggregates blockchain information specific to your project or services.

  • Comprehensive Data Aggregation: Gather all logs and data generated by your fungible tokens or other smart contracts effortlessly. Our solutions ensure no crucial information slips through the cracks.
  • Enhanced Performance: Experience faster and more reliable data retrieval compared to traditional RPC queries. Optimize your blockchain interactions and improve the overall efficiency of your operations.
  • Tailored Insights: Gain access to customized reports and analytics that provide actionable insights into your project's performance. Make data-driven decisions with confidence.
  • Scalability and Flexibility: Whether you're a startup or a large enterprise, our indexer solutions are designed to scale with your business. Easily adapt to growing data volumes and changing requirements.
  • Expert Support: Our team of experienced professionals is here to guide you every step of the way. From initial setup to ongoing maintenance, we ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Contact us to discuss your custom indexer needs
